SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:IF &$PLATFORM# EQ "WINDOWS" @echo off :ENDIF : DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
!------------------------------------------ LOGGING INPUT PARAMETERS ------------------------------------------ : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.COMMON_LOGGING
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Deployment group name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_DEPLOYGROUP#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_OBJ_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object type" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_OBJ_TYPE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object subtype" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_OBJ_SUBTYPE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Version number" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_VERSION_NUMBER#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Folder name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_FOLDER_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Persistent input file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_PERSISTENT_FILE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Dependency types" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_DEPENDENCY_TYPE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "DBD separator" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_DBD_SEPRATOR#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! logging start of execution : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.EXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT !------------------------------------------ VALIDATING INPUT PARAMETERS ---------------------------------------- ! create command to connect to repository : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGIN_REPOSITORY !------------------------------------------ CREATING PMREP COMMANDLET ------------------------------------------ : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "ADD OBJECT INTO DEPLOYMENT GROUP CMD EXECUTION" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO ! prepare command to add object into deployment group : SET &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# = "pmrep addtodeploymentgroup"
! DEPLOYMENT GROUP NAME : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_IPC_DEPLOYGROUP# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET#, " -p &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! IF INPUT FILE IS PROVIDED : IF &UC4RB_IPC_PERSISTENT_FILE# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_IPC_PERSISTENT_FILE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET#, " -i &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! OBJECT NAME : IF &UC4RB_IPC_OBJ_NAME# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_IPC_OBJ_NAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET#, " -n &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! OBJECT TYPE : IF &UC4RB_IPC_OBJ_TYPE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_IPC_OBJ_TYPE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET#, " -o &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! FOLDER NAME : IF &UC4RB_IPC_FOLDER_NAME# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_IPC_FOLDER_NAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET#, " -f &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! OBJECT SUBTYPE : IF &UC4RB_IPC_OBJ_SUBTYPE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_IPC_OBJ_SUBTYPE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET#, " -t &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! OBJECT VERSION NUMBER : IF &UC4RB_IPC_VERSION_NUMBER# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_IPC_VERSION_NUMBER# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET#, " -v &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! DEPENDENCY TYPE : SET &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET#, " -d &UC4RB_IPC_DEPENDENCY_TYPE#")
! DBD SEPARATOR : IF &UC4RB_IPC_DBD_SEPRATOR# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_IPC_DBD_SEPRATOR# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET#, " -s &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
!------------------------------------------ EXECUTING PMREP COMMANDLETS --------------------------------------------------------------------- ! LOGGING ADD DEPLOYMENT COMMAND LINE : SET &LOGGING_COMMAND# = &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_COMMAND &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET#
:IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" SET ERROR=%ERRORLEVEL% : ELSE error=$? :ENDIF
!------------------------------------------ DISCONNECTING FROM REPOSITORY ---------------------------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.PMREP_CLEANUP
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** ADD OBJECT INTO DEPLOYMENT GROUP ACTION FAILED ********" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE@GENERIC
!-------------------------------------------SUCCESS MESSAGE------------------------------------------------------------------------------- !Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** ADD OBJECT INTO DEPLOYMENT GROUP ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER
